dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So, are you ready for some serious weather whiplash in Astana this week?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, are you ready for some serious weather whiplash in Astana this week?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, thunderstorms and hail on June 5th? That's a pretty dramatic start.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, thunderstorms and hail on June fifth? That's a pretty dramatic start.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 5, the capital will experience partly cloudy skies, occasional rain, thunderstorms, and hail during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and those wind gusts up to 18 meters per second—that's no joke. You'd better hold onto your umbrella!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and those wind gusts up to eighteen meters per second-that's no joke. You'd better hold onto your umbrella!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Winds will shift from southwest to northwest at 9"14¯m/s, with gusts reaching 15"18¯m/s during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then, like, the very next day it's just... dry? Mild? Completely different story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, like, the very next day it's just... dry? Mild? Completely different story.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 6, the forecast is for partly cloudy skies with no precipitation. The weather will be mild and dry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, temperatures jumping up to like 29 degrees Celsius on the 6th. It's all over the place.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, temperatures jumping up to like twenty nine degrees Celsius on the sixth. It's all over the place.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperatures will range from +14 to +16¯ÂC at night and +27 to +29¯ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, Almaty is just chilling with sunny skies and heat—up to 33 degrees, which is pretty toasty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, Almaty is just chilling with sunny skies and heat-up to thirty three degrees, which is pretty toasty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nighttime temperatures will range from +18 to +20¯ÂC, and daytime temperatures from +31 to +33¯ÂC. Midweek in the southern capital will be hot and sunny.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But then even Almaty gets some rain and thunderstorms by the weekend. It's like the weather can't make up its mind.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then even Almaty gets some rain and thunderstorms by the weekend. It's like the weather can't make up its mind.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On June 7, the forecast is for partly cloudy skies, with short-term rain and thunderstorms during the day. The weekend will bring brief showers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And did you catch that part from Minister Yerlan Nyssanbayev about the summer forecast?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And did you catch that part from Minister Yerlan Nyssanbayev about the summer forecast?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah—some parts of the southwest could hit 45 degrees? That is scorching.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah-some parts of the southwest could hit forty five degrees? That is scorching.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In some parts of the southwest, temperatures could reach 45ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously, that's almost desert-level heat. I hope people stay hydrated out there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously, that's almost desert-level heat. I hope people stay hydrated out there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're saying rainfall might be a bit above normal in the north and south in June and July, but then it drops off later.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're saying rainfall might be a bit above normal in the north and south in June and July, but then it drops off later.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rainfall in June and July is expected to be within normal levels, though the north, south, and southeast may receive slightly more. In August and September, less rainfall is expected, and temperatures may be about 1ÂC above normal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So basically, pack for every season if you're traveling around Kazakhstan this summer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So basically, pack for every season if you're traveling around Kazakhstan this summer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Layers, umbrella, sunscreen—the whole survival kit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Layers, umbrella, sunscreen-the whole survival kit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Well, at least we're getting a heads-up. Better than a surprise hailstorm, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, at least we're getting a heads-up. Better than a surprise hailstorm, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Let's just hope the forecast holds and doesn't change too much.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Let's just hope the forecast holds and doesn't change too much.
